column1: * 1937 - C.S. Lewis publishes A World for Children of The Hobbit in The Times Literary Supplement.
* 1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to A.W. Riddle (2 October 1947).
* 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien receives an honorary doctorate from the wikipedia:University of Liège.
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "Over Hill and Under Hill" is aired on the BBC.
* 1980 - Unfinished Tales is first published in the UK.
* 1982 - The twelfth episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
** Gandalf travels towards Weathertop as well.
